eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Austin; Bandera; Bastrop; Bell; Bexar; Burleson; Burnet; Caldwell; Colorado; Comal; Coryell; DeWitt; Falls; Fayette; Gillespie; Guadalupe; Kerr; Kimble; Lampasas; Lavaca; Lee; Llano; McCulloch; Mason; Medina; Milam; San Saba; Washington; Williamson; Wilson, TX; AT 09:50 AM ON OCT 11, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:05 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Local AMBER Alert: Missing/Possibly Abducted Child from Bee Cave, TX. Missing child is Penelope Hernandez, 11 year old hispanic female last seen wearing light blue sleeve shirt, gray basketball shorts, unicorn backpack and a brown shoulder purse. Has circle scars on both forearms. Call Bee Cave Police Department with information. If seen call 9 1 1.
